abstract: At the bank’s annual general meeting on Wednesday, shareholders will finally have their opportunity to vote on whether or not to support his re-election to the board.
snippet: At the bank’s annual general meeting on Wednesday, shareholders will finally have their opportunity to vote on whether or not to support his re-election to the board.
lead_paragraph: For almost four months Bank of America’s shareholders have been spectators to the farce created by the bank’s takeover of Merrill Lynch. Losses have mounted, the stock has tanked, chairman and chief executive Ken Lewis has tried to blame others, including the government  and the board failed to act.

abstract: Shareholders stripped Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman title in a vote that may mark the beginning of the end of his leadership at the embattled bank.
snippet: Shareholders stripped Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman title in a vote that may mark the beginning of the end of his leadership at the embattled bank.
lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTE, N.C. — The applause thundered inside the Belk Theater on Wednesday for a fading star of American finance: Kenneth D. Lewis, the beleaguered head of Bank of America.

headline.main: Bank of America Chief Ousted as Chairman

abstract: Shareholders of Bank of America stripped Kenneth D. Lewis of his post as chairman on Wednesday while allowing him to remain president and chief executive, in a vote that may mark the beginning of the end of his leadership at the embattled bank.
snippet: Shareholders of Bank of America stripped Kenneth D. Lewis of his post as chairman on Wednesday while allowing him to remain president and chief executive, in a vote that may mark the beginning of the end of his leadership at the embattled bank.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:39 p.m. Shareholders of Bank of America stripped Kenneth D. Lewis of his post as chairman on Wednesday while allowing him to remain president and chief executive, in a vote that may mark the beginning of the end of his leadership at the embattled bank, The New York Times’s Louise Story reports from Charlotte, N.C.

headline.main: BofA Shareholders Oust Lewis as Chairman
